headline: Picus Security Recognized as “Customers’ Choice” in Gartner VOC Report on Adversarial Exposure Validation
summary: With a 97% “willingness to recommend” rating, the company believes this recognition reflects strong customer satisfaction and trust in Picus Security’s exposure validation capabilities Gartner Voice of the Customer Ranking With a 97% “willingness to recommend” rating from customers, the highest of all vendors, Picus Security was recognized as a Customers’ Choice vendor in the 2025 Gartner® Voice of the Customer for Adversarial Exposure Validation report. SAN FRANCISCO, Nov. 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSW

thumbnail.caption: With a 97% “willingness to recommend” rating from customers, the highest of all vendors, Picus Security was recognized as a Customers’ Choice vendor in the 2025 Gartner® Voice of the Customer for Adversarial Exposure Validation report.
